title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 230.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 230.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to all insurers offering coverage that is subject to the mental health and substance use disorder requirements under Insurance Law sections 3216, 3221, and 4303. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
230.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 30, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 39, eff. 12/29/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
